name: Girls Inc. of Greater Philadelphia & Southern New Jersey
organization: Girls Inc. of Greater Philadelphia & Southern New Jersey
description:
Girls Inc. runs a host of mentoring and research-based programming that equips girls to navigate gender, economic, and social barriers, and grow up healthy, educated, and independent. Informed by girls and their families, they also advocate for legislation and policies to increase opportunities and rights for all girls.

https://girlsincpa-nj.org/
